In England, in the seven days to 15 January, there were 547,081 new confirmed cases (967.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 January, there were 962,610 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 43% (415,529 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 January is 13,255,586 (23,440.4 cases per 100,000 population).
